__e: But to young and old, rich and poor, king and commoner he is known as Buffalo Bill.
I didn't know it was gonna lead to Buffalo Bill up there.
To get his help on Buffalo Bill, sir?
Hey, there, young fella. I'm looking for Buffalo Bob.
If I had any friends, they'd call me Buffalo Bob.
Probably feels pretty good. Especially after that brutal run-in with Buffalo Bob.
